EnemyInfo.Name: Dachora (Escape)
EnemyInfo.Description:
Runs back and forth (starting left) from the starting location. Once the acid rises, the enemy will run faster. If event 0x0F is set, the enemy will run to the right off screen.
The enemy will run 0xB4 pixels to the left and back. This can be changed be setting the following to (distance / 0x24): $B3:E966, $B3:E99A, $B3:E9D2, $B3:EA02
